label: 殿上人
対訳語: Courtier in Attendance on the Sovereign
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Later often called Dōjō. Court Nobles (Kuge) of the Fourth (Shi-i), Fifth (Go-i) and Sixth Ranks (Roku-i) who were permitted to wait in attendance on the Sovereign (shōden) in the Waiting Room of the Imperial Audience Chamber (Denjō-no-ma). [堂上、公家、四位、五位、六位、昇殿、殿上間]
